templates.template: <template id="assets_backend" name="${module_name} backend assets" inherit_id="web.assets_backend"> <xpath expr="." position="inside"> <link rel="stylesheet" href="/${module_name}/static/src/css/${style}.css"/> <script type="text/javascript" src="/${module_name}/static/src/js/${script}.js"></script> </xpath> </template> ${cursor}

<template id="assets_frontend" name="${module_name} frontend assets" inherit_id="website.assets_frontend"> <xpath expr="." position="inside"> <link rel="stylesheet" href="/${module_file}/static/src/css/${style}.css"/> <script type="text/javascript" src="/${module_file}/static/src/js/${script}.js"></script> </xpath> </template> ${cursor}
<button type="action" name="%(${action_id})d" string="${Label}" default_focus="0" help="" confirm="${Message}" /> ${cursor}

<button type="object" name="toggle_active" class="oe_stat_button" icon="fa-archive"> <!-- "Active" / "Deactive" button --> <field name="active" widget="boolean_button" options="{'terminology': 'active'}" /> <!-- "Not Archived" / "Archived" button --> <field name="active" widget="boolean_button" options="{'terminology': 'archive'}" /> </button> ${cursor}
<button string="${Label}" name="${python_function}" type="object" context="{}" default_focus="0" help="" confirm="${Message}" /> ${cursor}
${cursor}

${ReportTitle}

This object's name is

${cursor}

${Title} ${model} qweb primary

Report title

This object's name is

${Title} ${model} qweb primary ${Title} ${model} qweb-pdf ${report_name}_qweb (object.name+'.pdf') ${ToolTip} ${Title} ${model} action client_print_multi ${cursor}
${cursor}

<record id="action_view_${1:model_name}_tree" model="ir.actions.act_window.view"> <field name="act_window_id" ref="action_${Model}" /> <field name="view_mode">tree</field> <field name="view_id" ref="view_${Model}_tree" /> </record>
<record model="ir.actions.act_window.view" id="action_view_${Model}_form"> <field name="act_window_id" ref="action_${Model}" /> <field name="view_mode">form</field> <field name="view_id" ref="view_${Model}_form" /> </record> ${cursor}

<record id="${model_name}_action" model="ir.actions.client"> <field name="name">${Title}</field> <field name="res_model">${model}</field> <field name="tag">${model_name}_view</field> <field name="context">{${context}}</field> </record> ${cursor}

<record id="${1}" model="base.action.rule"> <field name="name">${Description}</field> <field name="active" eval="${True}" /> <field name="sequence" eval="${0}" /> <field name="server_action_ids" eval="[(4, ref('${ServerActionID}'))]" /> <field name="model_id" ref="${Model}" /> <field name="kind">${on_create_or_write}</field> <field name="trg_date_id" ref="${fields}" /> <field name="trg_date_range" eval="${0}" /> <field name="trg_date_range_type">${day}</field> <field name="trg_date_calendar_id" ref="${Calendar}" /> <field name="filter_id" ref="${filters}" /> <field name="filter_pre_id" ref="${filters}" /> <field name="act_user_id" ref="${User}" /> <field name="act_followers" eval="[(4, ref('${Partner}'))]" /> </record> ${cursor}

${Label} ${Class} tree,form {${5}} [${6}] new|inline|current ${True} ${client_action_multi}

Click to Add an ${Label}

${cursor}

template.description: Odoo record Action Window and MenuItem
template.name: o_record_action_window_menu

templates.template:
${Label} ${Class} tree,form {${5}} [${6}] new|inline|current

Click to Add an ${Label}

${cursor}

<record id="view_${1}_assets" model="ir.ui.view"> <field name="name">${Module} Assets</field> <field name="model">${Module}</field> <field name="type">qweb</field> <field name="mode">extension</field> <field name="priority" eval="${16}" /> <field name="active" eval="${True}" /> <field name="inherit_id" ref="web.assets_backend" /> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <xpath expr="." position="inside"> <link rel="stylesheet" href="/${module_file}/static/src/css/${styles}.css" /> <script type="text/javascript" src="/${module_file}/static/src/js/${scripts}.js" /> </xpath> </field> </record> ${cursor}
<record id="${1}" model="ir.config_parameter"> <field name="key">${char}</field> <field name="value">${text}</field> <field name="group_ids" eval="[(4, ref('${Groups}'))]" /> </record> ${cursor}

<record id="ir_cron_${cron_name}" model="ir.cron" > <field name="name">${Description}</field> <field name="model">${model_name}</field> <field name="function">${method_name}</field> <field name="args">(${args})</field> <field name="interval_number">${10}</field> <field name="interval_type">minutes|hours|days|weeks|months</field> <field name="user_id" ref="base.user_root" /> <field name="active">1</field> <field name="priority">1</field> <field name="nextcall">2016-01-01 00:00:00</field> <field name="numbercall">-1</field> <field name="doall" eval="False" /> </record> ${cursor}

${Title} ${Subject} (object.company_id.email or user.email)|safe object_name|safe ${cc} ${to} ${object_lang} To whom it may concern:

]]> ${cursor}

<record id="filter_${name}" model="ir.filters"> <field name="name">${Title}</field> <field name="model_id">${model_name}</field> <field name="user_id" eval="${False}"/> <field name="domain">[${domain}]</field> <field name="context">{${context}}</field> <field name="is_default" eval="${False}" /> <field name="action_id" ref="" /> </record> ${cursor}

<record id="${1}" model="res.groups"> <field name="name">${2}</field> <field name="category_id" ref="${3}"/> <field name="implied_ids" eval="[(4, ref(${4}))]"/> <field name="users" eval="[(5, ref('${51:base.user_root}'))]"/> <field name="comment">${Comment}</field> <field name="color">${Color}"</field> <field name="is_portal" eval="${True}"/> <field name="share" eval="${True}"/> </record> ${cursor}

<record id="${1}" model="ir.module.category"> <field name="name">${2}</field> <field name="description">${Description}</field> <field name="visible" eval="${True}"/> <field name="sequence">${10}</field> <field name="parent_id" ref="${ParentCategory}" /> </record> ${cursor}

<record id="menu_${menu}" model="ir.ui.menu" > <field name="name">${Label}</field> <field name="sequence" eval="${10}" /> <field name="action" ref="action_${action}_act_window" /> <field name="parent_id" ref="${parent_id}" /> <field name="parent_left"></field> <field name="parent_right"></field> <field name="web_icon_data"></field> <field name="web_icon_hover"></field> <field name="web_icon_hover_data"></field> <field name="icon"></field> <field name="needaction_enabled"></field> <field name="web_icon"></field> </record> ${cursor}

<record id="${ID}" model="ir.model"> <field name="model">${model_name}</field> <field name="name">${Title}</field> <field name="state">Base | Manual</field> <field name="info">${4:Description}</field> </record> ${cursor}

<record id="access_${model_access}" model="ir.model.access"> <field name="name">${Label}</field> <field name="model_id" ref="${model_name}"/> <field name="group_id" ref="${groups}"/> <field name="perm_read" eval="${True}" /> <field name="perm_create" eval="${True}" /> <field name="perm_write" eval="${True}" /> <field name="perm_unlink" eval="${True}" /> <field name="active" eval="${True}" /> </record> ${cursor}

<record id="${3}" model="ir.model.data"> <field name="name">${resource_external_id}</field> <field name="model">${model_name}</field> <field name="module">${module_name}</field> <field name="date_init" eval="time.strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')" /> <field name="date_update" eval="time.strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')" /> <field name="res_id" eval="${1}" /> <field name="noupdate" eval="${True}" /> </record> ${cursor}

<record id="paperformat_${1}" model="report.paperformat" > <field name="name">${Label}</field> <field name="format">${A4}</field> <field name="orientation">${Portrait}</field> <field name="default" eval="${False}" /> <field name="dpi" eval="${90}" /> <field name="margin_top" eval="${40}" /> <field name="margin_right" eval="${7}" /> <field name="margin_bottom" eval="${20}" /> <field name="margin_left" eval="${7}" /> <field name="header_line" eval="${False}" /> <field name="header_spacing" eval="${35}" /> <field name="page_width" eval="${210}" /> <field name="page_height" eval="${297}" /> <field name="report_ids" eval="[(4, ref('${16:ir.actions.report.xml}'))]" /> </record> <!-- ('A0', 'A0 5 841 x 1189 mm'), ('A1', 'A1 6 594 x 841 mm'), ('A2', 'A2 7 420 x 594 mm'), ('A3', 'A3 8 297 x 420 mm'), ('A4', 'A4 0 210 x 297 mm, 8.26 x 11.69 inches'), ('A5', 'A5 9 148 x 210 mm'), ('A6', 'A6 10 105 x 148 mm'), ('A7', 'A7 11 74 x 105 mm'), ('A8', 'A8 12 52 x 74 mm'), ('A9', 'A9 13 37 x 52 mm'), ('B0', 'B0 14 1000 x 1414 mm'), ('B1', 'B1 15 707 x 1000 mm'), ('B2', 'B2 17 500 x 707 mm'), ('B3', 'B3 18 353 x 500 mm'), ('B4', 'B4 19 250 x 353 mm'), ('B5', 'B5 1 176 x 250 mm, 6.93 x 9.84 inches'), ('B6', 'B6 20 125 x 176 mm'), ('B7', 'B7 21 88 x 125 mm'), ('B8', 'B8 22 62 x 88 mm'), ('B9', 'B9 23 33 x 62 mm'), ('B10', ':B10 16 31 x 44 mm'), ('C5E', 'C5E 24 163 x 229 mm'), ('Comm10E', 'Comm10E 25 105 x 241 mm, U.S. ' 'Common 10 Envelope'), ('DLE', 'DLE 26 110 x 220 mm'), ('Executive', 'Executive 4 7.5 x 10 inches, ' '190.5 x 254 mm'), ('Folio', 'Folio 27 210 x 330 mm'), ('Ledger', 'Ledger 28 431.8 x 279.4 mm'), ('Legal', 'Legal 3 8.5 x 14 inches, ' '215.9 x 355.6 mm'), ('Letter', 'Letter 2 8.5 x 11 inches, ' '215.9 x 279.4 mm'), ('Tabloid', 'Tabloid 29 279.4 x 431.8 mm'), ('custom', 'Custom') -->

<record id="${Product}_product_product" model="product.product"> <field name="name">${Title}</field> <field name="description">${Description}</field> <field name="description_purchase">${PurchaseDescription}</field> <field name="description_sale">${SaleDescription}}</field> <field name="categ_id" ref="${product_category}"/> <field name="standard_price">${0}</field> <field name="list_price">${0}</field> <field name="type">${service}</field> <field name="uom_id" ref="${uom}"/> <field name="uom_po_id" ref="${uom}"/> <field name="taxes_id" eval="[(4, ref('${tax}'))]" /> <field name="image" type="base64" file="module_name/static/img/file_name.png"/> <field name="default_code">${ProductCode}</field> <field name="ean13">${0000000000000}</field> </record> ${cursor}

<record id="${Product}_product_template}" model="product.template"> <field name="name">${Label}</field> <field name="description">${Description}</field> <field name="description_purchase">${PurchaseDescription}</field> <field name="description_sale">${SaleDescription}</field> <field name="categ_id" ref="${product_category}"/> <field name="standard_price">${0}</field> <field name="list_price">${0}</field> <field name="type">${service}</field> <field name="uom_id" ref="${uom}"/> <field name="uom_po_id" ref="${uom}"/> <field name="taxes_id" eval="[(4, ref('${tax}'))]" /> <field name="image" type="base64" file="module_name/static/img/file_name.png"/> <field name="default_code">${ProductCode}</field> <field name="ean13">${0000000000000}</field> </record> ${cursor}

<record id="action_${1}_report" model="ir.actions.report.xml"> <field name="name">${Label}</field> <field name="model">${Class}</field> <field name="report_type">qweb-pdf</field> <field name="report_name">${out_filename}</field> <field name="attachment_use" eval="${True}" /> <field name="attachment">${attachment}</field> <field name="paperformat_id" ref="report.paperformat_euro" /> <field name="help">${ToolTip}</field>} </record> ${cursor}

<record id="${1}_rule" model="ir.rule"> <field name="name">${2}</field> <field name="model_id" ref="${model_xml_id}"/> <field name="global" eval="${True}" /> <field name="perm_read" eval="${True}" /> <field name="perm_create" eval="${True}" /> <field name="perm_write" eval="${True}" /> <field name="perm_unlink" eval="${True}" /> <field name="domain_force">['|',('company_id','=',False),('company_id','child_of',[user.company_id.id])]</field> <field name="active" eval="${True}" /> </record> ${cursor}

<record id="sequence_${seq_name}" model="ir.sequence"> <field name="name">${Label}</field> <field name="code">${Code}</field> <field name="prefix">${20}</field> <field name="suffix">${31}</field> <field name="padding">${5}</field> <field name="number_next">${1}</field> <field name="number_increment">${1}</field> <field name="company_id" eval="${False}"/> <field name="use_date_range" eval="${True}"/> <field name="implementation">no_gap</field> </record> ${cursor}

<record id="${Class}_action" model="ir.actions.server"> <field name="name">${Label}</field> <field name="model_id" ref="model_${model_name}"/> <field name="context">{${context}}</field> <field name="action_id" ref="action_id" /> <field name="condition" eval="${True}" /> <field name="child_ids" eval="[(6, ref('${server_action_ids}'))]" /> <field name="code"> if object.some_condition(): action = { "type": "ir.actions.act_window", "view_mode": "form", "res_model": object._name, "res_id": object.id, } else: raise Warning(object.name)
# Evaluation context: self: the model object linked to the action via `model_id` object, obj: only available if `active_model` and `active_id` are provided (via context) otherwise `None`. The actual record selected by `active_id` pool: the current database registry datetime, dateutil, time: corresponding Python modules cr: the current cursor user: the current user record context: execution context Warning: constructor for the `Warning` exception}
## hr_expense addon example: if context.get('active_model') == 'hr.expense' and context.get('active_ids'): action = env['hr.expense'].browse(context['active_ids']).submit_expenses() </field>} </record> ${cursor}

<record id="action_todo_${1}" model="ir.actions.todo"> <field name="name">${Label}</field> <field name="type">${manual}</field> <field name="state">${open}</field> <field name="sequence" eval="${10}" /> <field name="action_id" ref="${action_id}" /> <field name="note">${Note}</field> </record> ${cursor}

<record id="${1}_values" model="ir.values"> <field name="name">${2}</field> <field name="model_id" ref="${model_id}" /> <field name="model">${class}</field> <field name="value" eval="'ir.actions.act_window,' +str(ref('${3:action_external_id}'))" /> <field name="key">${action}</field> <field name="key2">${client_action_multi}</field> <field name="action_id" ref="${action_id}" /> <field name="res_id" eval="${1}" /> <field name="company_id" ref="${company_id}" /> <field name="user_id" ref="${users}" /> </record> ${cursor}

<record id="${Model}_action_view_form/tree/search/calendar/graph/pivot/kanban" model="ir.actions.act_window.view"> <field name="act_window_id" ref="action_${Class}_views"/> <field name="view_mode">tree/kanban/form/calendar/pivot/graph</field> <field name="view_id" ref="view_${Class}_tree/kanban/form/calendar/pivot/graph"/> <field name="sequence" eval="${0}"/> </record> ${cursor}

<record id="view_${Model}_calendar" model="ir.ui.view"> <field name="name">view.${Class}.calendar</field> <field name="model">${Class}</field> <field name="type">calendar</field> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <calendar string="${Label}" date_start="${field_date}" color="${color_field}" event_open_popup="True" quick_add="True"> <field name="${field_to_show}" /> </calendar> </field> </record> ${cursor}

<record id="view_${Class}_form" model="ir.ui.view"> <field name="name">view.${Model}.form</field> <field name="model">${Class}</field> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <form string="${String}"> <header> <button string="${Label}" type="workflow|object|action" name="signal|method|action_id" states="${state}" class="oe_highlight"/> <field name="states" widget="statusbar" statusbar_visible="${states}" statusbar_colors="{'KEY_IS_STATE':'VALUE_IS_COLOR'}"/> </header> <sheet> <group name="${4}" string="${5}"> <field name="${field_name}"/> </group> </sheet> <footer></footer> </form> </field> </record> ${cursor}

<record id="view_${Model}_form_inherit" model="ir.ui.view"> <field name="name">view.${Class}.form.inherit</field> <field name="model">${Class}</field> <field name="inherit_id" ref="${ViewID}"/> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <field name="${field_name}" position="after:before:attributes:replace"> </field> </field> </record> ${cursor}

view.${Class}.form ${Class}
view.${Class}.tree ${Class} view.${Class}.search ${Class} ${Label} ${Class} tree,form {${context}} [${domain}] new|inline|current ${True} ${client_action_multi}

<record id="view_${Model}_graph" model="ir.ui.view"> <field name="name">view.${Class}.graph</field> <field name="model">${Class}</field> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <graph string="${Label}" stacked="True" type="one/bar/pie/line/pivot"> <field type="${row}" name="${row_m2o_field}" /> <field type="/row/col/g" name="${datefield}" interval="month" /> <field type="measure" name="${numericfield}" /> </graph> </field> </record> ${cursor}

<record id="view_${Model}_pivot" model="ir.ui.view"> <field name="name">view.${Class}.pivot</field> <field name="model">${Class}</field> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <pivot string="${Description}" disable_linking="True"> <field name="${Many2One}" type="${5:row}" /> <field name="${DateField}" interval="month" type="row/col/g" /> <field name="${NumericField}" type="measure" /> </pivot> </field> </record> ${cursor}

<record id="view_${Model}_form" model="ir.ui.view"> <field name="name">${Class}.form</field> <field name="model">${Class}</field> <field name="type">form</field> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <form> <header> <button string="Apply" type="object" name="execute" class="oe_highlight"/> or <button string="Cancel" type="object" name="cancel" class="oe_link"/> </header> ${sheet} </form> </field> </record>
<record model="ir.actions.act_window" id="action_${Model}"> <field name="name">${Label}</field> <field name="res_model">${Class}</field> <field name="view_type">form</field> <field name="view_mode">form</field> <field name="target">inline</field> </record>
<menuitem id="menu_${Model}" name="${Label}" parent="base.menu_config" action="action_${Model}" /> ${cursor}

<record id="view_${Model}_search" model="ir.ui.view"> <field name="name">view.${Class}.search</field> <field name="model">${Class}</field> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <search string="${Label}"> <field name="${FieldName}"/> <filter string="${Label2}" domain="[${Domain}]"/> <group expand="0" string="Group By"> <filter string="${Label3}" context="{${Context}}"/> </group> </search> </field> </record> ${cursor}

<record id="view_${Model}_search_inherit" model="ir.ui.view"> <field name="name">view.${Class}.search.inherit</field> <field name="model">${Class}</field> <field name="inherit_id" ref="${ViewID}"/> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <field name="${field_name}" position="after:before:attributes:replace"> </field> </field> </record> ${cursor}

<record id="view_${Model}_tree" model="ir.ui.view"> <field name="name">view.${Class}.tree</field> <field name="model">${Class}</field> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <tree string="${Label}" decoration-info="state == 'draft'" decoration-muted="state in ('done', 'cancel')"> <field name="${FieldName}"/> </tree> </field> </record> ${cursor}

<record id="view_${Model}_tree_inherit" model="ir.ui.view"> <field name="name">view.${Class}.tree.inherit</field> <field name="model">${Class}</field> <field name="inherit_id" ref="${ViewID}"/> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <field name="${field_name}" position="after:before:attributes:replace"> </field> </field> </record> ${cursor}

${Class}.wizard ${Class}
${Description} ${Class} form form new ${cursor}

<record id="${Mode}_activity" model="workflow.activity"> <field name="wkf_id" ref="${WorkflowName}_workflow"/> <field name="name">${Label}</field> <field name="flow_start">True</field> <field name="flow_stop">True</field> <field name="kind">dummy/function/stopall/subflow</field> <field name="action">${5}</field> </record> ${cursor}

<record id="${id_act1}_${id_act2}_transition" model="workflow.transition"> <field name="act_from" ref="${id_act1}_activity"/> <field name="act_to" ref="${id_act2}_activity"/> <field name="signal">signal_${goto}_${id_act2}</field> <field name="sequence">${31}</field> </record> ${cursor}

<act_window
    name="${ActionName}"
    id="${Model}_action"
    res_model="${Model}"
    src_model="${Model2}"}
    view_type="${form}"}
    view_mode="tree,form,calendar,graph"}
    view_id="${view_id}"}
    domain="${domain}"}
    context="${context}"}
    groups="${Groups}"}
    target="new"}
    multi="True"}
    key2="client_action_multi"}
    web_icon="${61:module},static/description/icon.png"
/>
${cursor}

<field name="${field_name}" string="${Label}" nolabel="${0}" required="${0}" readonly="${0}" invisible="${0}" widget="${char}" class="oe_field_${Class}" placeholder="${PlaceHolder}" help="${ToolTip}" mode="${tree}" filename="${fiel_name}" password="${0}" domain="[${domain}]" context="{${context}}" /> ${cursor}
<footer> <button name="${Function}" string="${Label}" type="object" class="oe_highlight"/> or <button string="Cancel" class="oe_link" special="cancel" /> </footer> ${Cursor}
<group string="${1}" name="${2}"> <group name="${3}" sring="${4}">${5}</group> <group name="${6}" sring="${7}">${8}</group> </group> ${cursor}

template.description: Odoo Tag Header With Button and State
template.name: o_tag_header_button_state

templates.template: <header> <button string="${Label}" type="workflow|object|action" name="signal|method|action_id" states="${state}" class="oe_highlight"/> <field name="${field_name}" widget="statusbar" statusbar_visible="${states}" statusbar_colors="{'KEY_IS_STATE':'VALUE_IS_COLOR'}"/> </header> ${cursor}
<menuitem id="${1}_menu" name="${Label}" parent="${menu_parent}" action="${action}" sequence="${10}" groups="${groups}" web_icon="module_file/static/description/icon.png"/> ${cursor}
<page string="${Label}" class="${Class}" accesskey="${AccessKey}"> <group name="${GroupName}" sring="${Label2}"> <field name="${field_name}"/> </group> </page> ${cursor}

<report id="action_report_${model_name}" model="${model}" report_type="qweb-pdf" string="${ReportName}" name="${module_name}.report_${model_name}" file="${module_name}.report_${model_name}" />
<record id="action_report_${model_name}" model="ir.actions.report.xml"> <field name="paperformat_id" ref="${paperformat_id}" /> </record> ${cursor}
